home.description: An open source key bindings library written in TypeScript.

about.text:
The purpose of this library is to provide a simple and easy to use key binding declaration.

Check Example and Code section for more information on how to use Krait.js.
There is also a documentation if you need to go deeper.

You can help develop Krait.js on Github.

code.p1: Instantiate a Keyboard class and creates input listeners.

contact.description: Feel free to ask me about my work, give me suggestions, or just to say hi.
